messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Mike: I can’t embarrass myself again.
Not in front of my girlfriend!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
Mike: Awww, jeez.
Man, that’s a downer...
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Mike: Coming here again brings back
all kinds of memories of me and Nat.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Mike: You can’t battle with us.
Not with one Pokémon, anyway.
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Nat: I don’t want to look bad again.
Not when my boyfriend is watching!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_2:
Nat: This makes me feel hollow
inside... Oh, so hollow...
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Nat: The Pokémon that brought me and
Mike together is buried here...
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Nat: You do have at least two
Pokémon, don’t you?
